FuncDef:
The shutdown command enables an SRv6 TE Policy.
The undo shutdown command disables an SRv6 TE Policy.
By default, the SRv6 TE policy is not shutdown.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To temporarily disable an SRv6 TE Policy, run the shutdown command. When needed, you can run the undo shutdown command to enable the SRv6 TE Policy again.
